# css蒙层
看到B站弹幕不遮挡人脸想到了这个

贴一段代码
-webkit-mask-image: linear-gradient(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0) 8.71143%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 8.71143%), linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 91.2886%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 91.2886%, rgb(0, 0, 0)), linear-gradient(to right, rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0) 0.876494%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0.876494%), linear-gradient(to right, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 99.1235%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 99.1235%, rgb(0, 0, 0)), url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,")
